A rookie dev encrypted secrets with RSA but accidentally reused the same prime for two keys. Can you recover the flag from this ciphertext? 389252381278790847928011073076232781664578012990813409398214650208025504266793639989311243106049647033424173478841193517368783225556402806995959482741724352066072410327929305870711675443112449615662871846027050479810653820836703527

The flag format is flag{...}
n=783238138802080986792530240665941271707919820301666204129035665994939499365926546608865990271848381814075618515683935499143889438289962042630353495601778533838643588911926305826986046170245343136182261400562269742774535661827153041, e=213221489494435102697173360105726623407898231618142817318900081337526852880558395559207912478407365553784762902290273384194471317135182956701521072522455364628884110366342583738130405692221158840652873141098329785416571492328819049

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{zrt73a8g}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 389252381278790847928011073076232781664578012990813409398214650208025504266793639989311243106049647033424173478841193517368783225556402806995959482741724352066072410327929305870711675443112449615662871846027050479810653820836703527
vulnerability: repeated primes
hint: The RSA modulus n is a perfect square. This often indicates a repeated prime usage vulnerability.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=783238138802080986792530240665941271707919820301666204129035665994939499365926546608865990271848381814075618515683935499143889438289962042630353495601778533838643588911926305826986046170245343136182261400562269742774535661827153041, e=213221489494435102697173360105726623407898231618142817318900081337526852880558395559207912478407365553784762902290273384194471317135182956701521072522455364628884110366342583738130405692221158840652873141098329785416571492328819049
extra_info: p=27986392029021550651300100392718789732014813921740661591525614398083628114416829902336733612717059945379426575994071, q=27986392029021550651300100392718789732014813921740661591525614398083628114416829902336733612717059945379426575994071, Ï†(n)=783238138802080986792530240665941271707919820301666204129035665994939499365926546608865990271848381814075618515683879526359831395188659442429568058022314504210800107588743254598189878914016509476377587933336835622883776808675164900
subtype: repeated_prime_usage
archetype: rsa
